sentence.text: He liked her in minuscule bikinis or high-cut swimming costumes .
I cut it out of Cosmopolitan magazine : an article entitled ` Think Yourself Thin " , illustrated by a blonde woman in a bikini being carried on the arms of two grinning , solid young men .
Cindy was sitting on a stool resplendent in a black Chanel blazer , her expensively manicured fingers circling a glass of wine .
He stared at the two assistants in their smart white blouses and green aprons .
It showed three little girls in sandals and sundresses grouped together with a spaniel dog .
They were handed to him by a tiny nut-brown man in a red fez , who also sold little packets of sugared almonds and pistachios .
There was a soldier in battledress and beret by the door , and he stood aside to let them pass .
There are even people in berets , but no one minds .
A sailor stood beside the captain , behind them a dozen men in jungle fatigues and black berets .
In the yard an old man in a beret was clipping a pony 's mane .
The group leader in beautiful boots
A woman in a heavy coat , head-scarf and fur-lined boots stood patiently holding a string which ran down through a circular hole in the ice .
Men in jeans and leather jackets go by , men limping , men lighting cigarettes , veiled women , women in flesh-coloured tights , lugging shopping , men in leather jackets …
Men in jeans and leather jackets go by , men limping , men lighting cigarettes , veiled women , women in flesh-coloured tights , lugging shopping , men in leather jackets …
And Uncle Camillo in his armour with the lamp shining on the breastplate and helmet , and the vizor down so you could not see if he were laughing .
` A veritable knight in shining armour , " Portia laughed .
This must be a taste of how it was to be a Marine in armour , whose servo-suit responded to the motions of his body , magnifying these …
` We would n't have been here then , " the one in the nun 's costume said , snapping the last of her buckles .
We shall all be in rags … ”
From the outskirts on , he stayed close to the gutter to avoid the lorries disgorging troops in the grey/green uniforms of the National People 's Army , the NVA .
They were all in camouflage combat uniform and calf-boots .
Like Querelle , men in tatty soiled uniforms are flexing their muscles , while others stare vacantly into the middle distance .
The wallpaper of the room had been the palest of yellow decorated with tiny Japanese ladies in pink and grey kimonos .
` Five over here , " said a big fat man in a shameless wig .
Caroline turned to see a group of men and women , in peasant-style attire of white shirts , black boots and braid-trimmed red and yellow skirts and trousers , making their way towards them .
LANDED GENTLY : Fergie , now in a one-piece bathing costume , and friend crawl out of their hideaway swimming pool after a refreshing dip
